sentences.cn: 隆重的欢迎场面等待着他们。

sentences.en: And Princely giver , who hast brought the gold.
sentences.cn: 你心坎里金碧辉煌的宝藏、.

sentences.en: Another year closes in. Still, there is the reassuring uplift of fairy tales like Hans Christian Andersen's duckling turned swan, with its metamorphosis from plain to princely.
sentences.cn: 幸好，还有安徒生虚构的丑小鸭变成白天鹅的童话来作为精神鼓励，平凡与高贵原来只有一线之隔。

sentences.en: At the ticket gate I had to purchase princely sum of RMB 245 a smart card.
sentences.cn: 门票是一张智能卡,是必须买的,价格高得出奇:245元一张.

sentences.en: For his first book he received the princely sum of $ 400.
sentences.cn: 他写第一本书得到了400元“巨款”.

sentences.en: He offered us a princely sum for it.
sentences.cn: 他慷慨出资要将它买下.
可以说是一顿丰厚的美宴.

sentences.en: It was the embodiment of princely magnificence.
sentences.cn: 这体现了和亲王相称的富丽堂皇。

sentences.en: It'll cost them the princely sum of seventy-five pounds.
sentences.cn: 这将花费他们75英镑巨款。

sentences.en: Princely outstanding: Outside ambient is not quite good still now.
sentences.cn: 王子杰: 现在外界环境还是不太好.

sentences.en: So , the legendary beggar, is actually born into a princely rich family.
sentences.cn: 苏乞儿为满州旗人贵族, 一门两代是二世祖.

sentences.en: Stephen seated himself noiselessly before the princely presence.
sentences.cn: 斯蒂芬一声不响地在亲王那幅仪表堂堂的肖像前面坐下来.

sentences.en: Still, there is the reassuring uplift of fairy tales like Hans Christian Andersen's duckling turned swan, with its metamorphosis from plain to princely.
sentences.cn: 幸好，还有安徒生虚构的丑小鸭变成白天鹅的童话来作为精神鼓励，平凡与高贵原来只有一线之隔。

sentences.en: They contracted left - handed marriages after the princely fashion of those days.
sentences.cn: 他们按照当时的皇家风尚,缔结了门户不相当的婚姻.

sentences.en: They paid me the princely sum of 50 p.
sentences.cn: 他们付给我一笔50便士的巨款.

sentences.en: They paid me the princely sum of USD 5000.
To many people in many places, it is a princely sum to live on.
sentences.cn: 对于很多地方的很多人来说, 这笔钱可以过上贵族般的生活.

sentences.en: Unlike are we , unlike , O princely Heart!
sentences.cn: 抒情十四行诗集第三首.
